resources.string: Last night of the Furore will be the DJ night. The best part of the fest. The electronic music ll rock and tune your hearts.
This time at Furore’15 its double the awesomeness , we have two shows for you.

First up ll be our very own Bengaluru boy Brodha V. He is a rapper, composer and producer. From the iconic crew Machas with attitude (MWA). He ll blow your mind with his awesome and catchy lyrics coupled with groovy music.
Second we have two hot female DJs from electroverts who ll mix and mash some of the best tracks. They are going to entertain you and make you grove till you sweat it out.
Hope to see you all there because its going to be one hell of a night you don’t want miss!\n\nRock on!!

string.name: terms
string.a: By logging in through Facebook you agree to the Terms and Conditions

resources.string:
The winner ll get a free pass to DJ night and ll get a chance to take a selfie with the artist

RULES

You should upload your selfie or you should be there in the picture

The picture you upload ll also be uploaded to official facebook page of Furore 15

The ranking is measured by likes got to your picture in the app as well as on the photos uplaoded on facebook page (Furore 15)

The winner ll be announced on our facebook page
